articles.content: A Nintendo Switch RPG is currently on sale via the Nintendo eShop, and this sale runs until August 28. Three days later, the game will be delisted from the Nintendo eShop, which means it will no long… [+1979 chars]

articles.author: Alice Newcome-Beill
articles.title: Best gaming deals: PlayStation 5, Blu-rays, Lego, and more - Polygon
articles.description: Multiple retailers are still offering a $50 discount on the PlayStation 5 through Aug. 19. You can also find deals this weekend on the DualSense PS5 controller, and a Lego DeLorean.
articles.content: With summer in the rear-view mirror, were looking forward to the upcoming launch of several AAA titles, including Armoured Core 6, Starfield, and Mortal Kombat 1. However, we must unfortunately also … [+4348 chars]

articles.author: Boone Ashworth
articles.title: Apple Will Finally Pay for Throttling iPhones With 'Batterygate' Settlement - WIRED
articles.description: Plus: Amazon Music gets pricier, a bunch of people still want to ban TikTok in the US, and it’s only getting hotter on planet Earth.
articles.content:
If you had battery-related performance issues on an older iPhoneand you got in on a class-action lawsuit against Apple six years agoyou could soon receive some payback for your trouble.
